mapper.insert: /* Price.insertPrdtPrice*/ INSERT INTO tb_product_price (prdt_price_seq, prdt_dscnt_price, dscnt_start_dt, dscnt_end_dt, rgst_dtm, prdt_code) VALUES(product_price_sq.nextVal, #{prdtDscntPrice}, #{dscntStartDt}, #{dscntEndDt}, TO_DATE(#{rgstDtm}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{prdtCode})
